title: Falador Rooftop Course

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Falador Rooftop Agility Course is a rooftop course located in eastern Falador available to players with an Agility level of 50. It is preceded by the Canifis Rooftop Course and followed by the Seers' Village Rooftop Course.

Falador Rooftop Course
Released5 December 2013 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationFalador

↓
Falador

The Falador Rooftop Agility Course is a rooftop course located in eastern Falador available to players with an Agility level of 50. It is preceded by the Canifis Rooftop Course and followed by the Seers' Village Rooftop Course.

The Falador Rooftop Agility Course can be started by climbing the south side wall of the house directly east of the Mining Guild in Falador. Players get 440 experience from completing the course, including the 180 experience from the last roof jump. One lap from start to start takes roughly one minute, making the maximum hourly experience rate approximately 26.4k xp/hour, whereas the average rate of xp would lie between 20.5k - 22k xp/hour, depending on agility levels, as higher agility means failing obstacles less. From levels 50 to 60 agility, it will take about 392 laps.

Marks of grace can spawn on any of the accessible roofs with flat portions, excluding the first and last roofs and the most western roof of the Mining Guild. The rate of spawn is roughly once per 5 laps.

It's possible to fail during the "Hand Holds" and "Tightrope 2" sections, dealing 4-8 and 5-6 damage respectively.

At 66 Agility you will stop failing the course.

Completing a lap at this course is a requirement for the Hard Falador Diary.

The '''Falador Rooftop Agility Course''' is a [[Rooftop Agility Course|rooftop course]] located in eastern [[Falador]] available to players with an [[Agility]] level of 50. It is preceded by the [[Canifis Rooftop Course]] and followed by the [[Seers' Village Rooftop Course]].

The Falador Rooftop Agility Course can be started by climbing the south side wall of the house directly east of the [[Mining Guild]] in Falador. Players get 440 experience from completing the course, including the 180 experience from the last roof jump. One lap from start to start takes roughly one minute, making the maximum hourly experience rate approximately 26.4k xp/hour, whereas the average rate of xp would lie between 20.5k - 22k xp/hour, depending on agility levels, as higher agility means failing obstacles less. From levels 50 to 60 agility, it will take about 392 laps.

[[Mark of grace|Marks of grace]] can spawn on any of the accessible roofs with flat portions, excluding the first and last roofs and the most western roof of the Mining Guild. The rate of spawn is roughly once per 5 laps.

It's possible to fail during the "Hand Holds" and "Tightrope 2" sections, dealing 4-8 and 5-6 damage respectively.

At 66 [[Agility]] you will stop failing the course.

Completing a lap at this course is a requirement for the [[Falador Diary#Hard|Hard Falador Diary]].
